Title: iPhone 16 Pro Max
Description: The iPhone 16 Pro Max features a stunning Super Retina XDR display, advanced A16 Bionic chip for seamless performance, and an upgraded camera system. Experience 5G speed and all-day battery life. Designed with a durable ceramic shield front cover.

Title: Samsung Galaxy S23 Ultra
Description: Samsung Galaxy S23 Ultra offers top-tier features with a massive 200MP camera, S Pen support, and dynamic AMOLED display. Powered by Snapdragon 8 Gen 2, it ensures ultra-smooth performance for all your tasks.

Reviews.name: Nusrat
Reviews.comment: Best phone with an amazing camera.

Title: Sony WH-1000XM5 Wireless Headphones
Description: Sony WH-1000XM5 delivers industry-leading noise cancellation and crystal-clear sound. Lightweight design with all-day comfort, up to 30 hours battery life, and quick charging support make it ideal for long listening sessions.

Reviews.name: Nafis
Reviews.comment: A bit expensive but worth it.

Title: Apple Watch Series 8
Description: Apple Watch Series 8 features advanced health tracking including ECG and blood oxygen sensors. It’s designed for both fitness and productivity with always-on Retina display and new temperature sensing.
ReturnPolicy: Can return within 10 days if not activated.

Title: Dell XPS 13 Laptop
Description: Dell XPS 13 offers premium build quality, a virtually borderless InfinityEdge display, and powerful 12th Gen Intel processors. It is lightweight, fast, and perfect for both productivity and entertainment.

title: Canon EOS R5 Camera
description: Capture every detail with the 45MP full-frame sensor. Experience high-speed shooting with up to 20fps silent shutter. Built-in 8K video recording ensures cinematic content creation.
returnPolicy: Return within 7 days for a full refund

reviews.name: Jahid
reviews.comment: Worth the price for video shooting.

title: Bose QuietComfort 45 Headphones
description: Immerse yourself in world-class noise cancellation. Soft ear cushions and long battery life provide day-long comfort. Bluetooth connectivity ensures hassle-free wireless experience.

reviews.name: Fahim
reviews.comment: Nice battery life, could be louder.

title: LG OLED C2 Series TV
description: Enjoy cinematic visuals with OLED technology. The α9 Gen5 AI processor delivers realistic color and deep contrast. Dolby Vision and Atmos offer immersive viewing experience.

title: Google Pixel 7 Pro
description: Capture stunning photos with the 50MP triple camera system. Experience smooth performance with Google Tensor chip. Pure Android experience with timely updates.

title: Microsoft Surface Laptop 5
description: Experience premium design and touch screen productivity. Powered by 12th Gen Intel processors for effortless performance. Lightweight and stylish for professionals on the go.

reviews.name: Lamia
reviews.comment: A bit expensive but worth it.

Title: Sony PlayStation 5
Description: Experience lightning-fast loading with an ultra-high-speed SSD. Immerse yourself in deeper gaming experiences with support for haptic feedback and adaptive triggers. Play a back catalog of supported PS4 games with system update.
ReturnPolicy: 7-day return policy if unopened and in original condition.

Title: Nintendo Switch OLED
Description: Enjoy vivid gaming with the 7-inch OLED screen. This handheld console provides immersive visuals and enhanced audio. Switch between handheld, tabletop, and TV modes seamlessly.

Title: DJI Mavic 3 Drone
Description: Capture breathtaking aerial footage with dual-camera system. 46-minute flight time and advanced obstacle avoidance make it ideal for professionals. Explore the sky with unmatched clarity.
WarrantyInformation: 1 year warranty with DJI Care options.

Title: GoPro Hero 11 Black
Description: Shoot 5.3K video and capture 27MP photos with the latest action camera. Perfect for adventures, vlogging, or travel. Rugged and waterproof with excellent stabilization.

Title: Amazon Echo Dot (5th Gen)
Description: Smart speaker with Alexa for hands-free control of your music, smart home devices, and more. Compact design fits perfectly into small spaces. Improved speaker quality for clearer sound.

Title: Samsung 4K Smart Monitor
Description: Experience stunning 4K UHD resolution with this smart monitor. Features built-in apps for streaming and office productivity. Sleek design fits perfectly on any desk.

Description: Large 34-inch display with powerful hardware for work and entertainment. Sleek all-in-one design saves space. Ideal for professionals and creatives.

Description: High capacity 26800mAh power bank with fast charging. Compact design with multiple USB ports for charging multiple devices at once. Perfect for travel.
